verses.verse: Josiah<WH2977> was eight<WH8083> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> when he began to reign<WH4427>, and he reigned<WH4427> in Jerusalem<WH3389> one<WH259> and thirty<WH7970> years<WH8141>.
